description:
Strengthen your Decision Making and Business Modeling skills and become the best Financial Modeler in town.

Why Financial Modeling- Facebook Case Study ?

Valuing real companies is no child’s play. Although we advocate that financial modeling is 90% engineering and 10% art, but that 10% can change the numbers from 1 Bn to 10 Bn (If not 100!). There are so many variables that determine the facebook valuation that it would take me a gazillion words to explain it.

This Financial Modeling course teaches you the art of constructing an integrated financial model – from scratch for a real life company. You will soon be building models that are robust and provide you with flexible projections that can be used to thoroughly analyze a company from multiple standpoints: Planning, Investment, Financing and Valuation.

Professional Recognition & Job Satisfaction

  • Financial Modeling is a key element in most major business decisions It is a must to have skill for career progression!
  • Financial Modelers are in demand when it comes to Strategic Decision Making
  • Additional advantage for people pursuing CPA, CFA, FRM or MBA Finance.

Unique Offerings of this Program:

  • 10 Exclusive videos exlaining different statements of Financial Modeling, S1 filing, BASE Rule, different drivers, assumptions, ratio analysis, complete valuation etc.
  • 10 Word files explaining the concepts stepwise in detail.
  • Excel files for learning step by step Financial Modeling through Facebook Model.
  • Download complete course material for future reference
  • Learn with Real Life Case Studies
  • 24 X 7 access to Discussion Forums

Why EduPristine ?

  • Get Trained by highly proficient Industry Experts
  • Practice Financial Modeling on Real Life Case Study
  • Complimentary access to Live Webinars on Financial Modeling
  • One of the leading International Training provider for Financial Modeling Certification.

Website: www.edupristine.com/ca/courses/financial-modeling/

Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/edupristine

Twitter:https://twitter.com/edupristine

Blogs:http://www.edupristine.com/blog/

Sample Models

To understand the nature of models that you would be creating, have a look at the sample models covering the Equity Valuation of Zynga and GroupOn
title: Financial Modeling - Facebook Case Study
